title: Ocean Week Mystery Champion update
body:
Hey everyone,

As some of you have noticed the Ocean Week reward for a Mystery Champion sendout has begun.

This process is done in batches, so if you haven't received yours yet and you earned at least 4 points during Ocean Week don't worry it will come during the week. The process should complete at the end of this week.

Once it's finished we'll put a 'Mystery Champion is here!' article in the client.

Here's the site again for context! http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/

replies.body: What happens if we have received a skin though we do not have all of the champions, as I logged in today this is what happened to me so I was just wondering how we would go by actually getting a champion instead of the skin I was given?

Same here - 11 champs left to unlock and I received a Sejuani Skin.

[Click here to view my store champions screen that shows 11 champs all above 450IP](http://i.imgur.com/Ty32nqB.png)

Updated to include screenshot of 11 champs that are all above 450IP.

Yeah, after I posted this I have seen a few similar posts. 7 champions left and I got an Alistar skin, still no word from a Red though on how to go by this, guess we are just going to have to wait and see or until enough people start writing similar posts =/

Bard and Jhin are my only champs left and I got a skin. Don't really care though

EDIT: As added by roguestoney

Riot Zaps (OCE) - about 16 hours ago 1 of 1 Rioter Comments
If you earned enlisted and earned 4 points during Ocean Week - and you can't receive a Mystery Champion (less than 10 champions available that cost more than 450IP) - then you'll get a Mystery Skin. These are still being handed out in batches, so you should hopefully see it soon if you haven't already!

Source: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/0WkT4E7O-ocean-week-gifts

TL:DR - Must have at least 10 champions that cost more than 450 IP left to buy to receive a mystery champion; Skin otherwise
We get a mystery skin if we have all the champions, right?
Youll get a Champ because you have Draven Only {{champion:119}}
That didn't answer the question at all for those of us with all the champions lol
The answer is Yes you will get a mystery skin, IF you have all the Champions
I got a skin instead of one of the champs i dont own?

> [{quoted}](name=Krunkotica,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=LryNggNH,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2016-02-04T05:13:43.237+0000)
>
> I got a skin instead of one of the champs i dont own?

Same thing with me. I don't mind I guess but thought it was meant to be a champion.

> [{quoted}](name=chezwickcheese,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=LryNggNH,comment-id=00140001,timestamp=2016-02-04T21:37:36.212+0000)
>
> Same thing with me. I don't mind I guess but thought it was meant to be a champion.

This might be applicable to you.


_**Riot Zaps (OCE)  - about 16 hours ago 1 of 1 Rioter Comments**_
If you earned enlisted and earned 4 points during Ocean Week - and you can't receive a Mystery Champion (less than 10 champions available that cost more than 450IP) - then you'll get a Mystery Skin. These are still being handed out in batches, so you should hopefully see it soon if you haven't already!

Source: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/0WkT4E7O-ocean-week-gifts
Same thing just happened to me. There's still a few champions and I don't own, and yet I got a skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Tic3ooo,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=LryNggNH,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2016-02-04T06:06:45.610+0000)
>
> Same thing just happened to me. There's still a few champions and I don't own, and yet I got a skin.

Riot doesn't really want people getting guaranteed champions from Mystery Champion. By that I mean, if you only have one champion left to buy like {{champion:202}} for example, then Riot will just give you a skin instead.
well i had 3 left so i guess thats what happened then
if you have less than 10 champions remaining you will receive a skin. they've said it before
Will Jhin be given out if you have no other champs remaining, or will you get a skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Dem Trolls,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=LryNggNH,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-02-02T13:00:47.602+0000)
>
> Will Jhin be given out if you have no other champs remaining, or will you get a skin?

You might get Jhin but Riot is probably reluctant to give you a mystery champion just to get a guaranteed Jhin. It doesn't really seem fair and it kinda defeats the purpose of 'Mystery Champion'.

EDIT: I think you don't get a mystery champion if you have almost all the champions bought (like maybe 1-5 champions remaining) you'll just get a mystery skin, unfortunately. Like I mentioned, it defeats the purpose of the reward if you know you're just gonna get Jhin or some other guaranteed champion you don't own.
thats the point though you dont own them i have around 7 left and got given a ruthless pantheon skin -__- yay...
if you have less than 10 champions remaining you will receive a skin. they've said it before
By the way Sephyre... how long do you spend on the forums (sorry unrelated to the topic), i am really interested!

As much time as I can :)

Hard to really put a number of hours to it, but i check in fairly often.

Like, i'll usually have a tab open at work, often at home, and i'll habitually skim on my phone on the train, but still not enough to keep up with every thread, nowhere near it. Maraudaur and Agent Mindstar in help and support are better at it than me.

Also quite often I get help from awesome community members pinging me on Twitter to a thread.
Sephyre you are my hero!

Wow... thats a lot! 
So happy that someone else loves League as much as I do!

The only problem is all the players in unranked being all "professional" and "carrying" and flaming at all us people who don't play it seriously. But no-one can get rid of that
My brother was telling me that they gift the Champ based on Alphabetical order of Summoner Names. Is this true?
I got Zilean... Im Zozuh o.o
Cho'gath for me...
doubt it, its random. RNG: random number generator
Yes, it is.
Well uhhh... No offence, but you must be pretty bad to only win 2 games out of 10...
I GOT YORICKK {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} , let me refund pls :}.
Be happy Yorick is totally killer
Killer in NA, useless in OCE ;) jks...maybe

Killer or noob teams. 

I hardly ever see him played anymore its kinda sad.
Yorick is the best champ in the game.
I still didnt get my champ this is bs
DON'T LET DOMINION DIE
I still havent got anything all week and im still waiting but nothing is happening no champion no skin no nothing all my friends got theires by now but not me i am annoyed
i got 10 points during the event and i haven't received anything other then the icon and i made sure i got 10 points so i could get everything and i even have people that can vouch for me that i did

Unless I'm reading the conditions wrong I think something still went wrong with me.  You needed at least 10 champs to unlock that cost more than 450IP?

I've got 11 champs left to unlock and they are all either 7,800, 6,300  or 4,800IP - [Click here to see a screenshot of my store champions screen](http://i.imgur.com/Ty32nqB.png)
I would put in a ticket with riot then. My understanding is the same as what you've put there. 10 champs all costing more than 450 IP each. They should be able to clean it up for you.
Unrelated but, riot there are a lot of broken champs, not broken but overpowered such as zed and yasuo, a lot of people find them annoying, what do u think about this?
very unrelated, they will not reply. also the champs you mentioned are not broken. youre just low elo.

Have all the free champion tier rewards been given out or are the skin rewards just delayed?

Because I have all champs but haven't gotten a skin yet while everyone seems to have gotten champions already.

I don't even know. The last time I got a mystery champ was taric, and my last one from rito was malphite. But today, Riot Games blesses me with a mystery champ of Jhin :D 
I don't even know anymore....
I got {{champion:67}}! *Wink wonk*
i GOT illaoi
